Description: On I-64 at mile marker 246 in the County of James City, near Busch Gardens, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west left shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 283 in the County of Shenandoah, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 184.4 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
